name: Flappy ROFL-Copter
description:
Welcome to the general Flappy Bird clone for PC: Flappy ROFL-Copter.
In this game, you play as a special helicopter of ROFL type.

SOI your way through the random walls and don't get hit by one!

Controlls:
Click anywhere to go up. Use left mouse button. Seriously. Any other buttons won't work.
On Xbox 360/One Controller for Windows will surely work, if you press the A button.

Original Flappy Bird by: .gears inc
ROFL-Copter belongs to: SteniS (on the Inc Gamers Warcraft III forum)
Engine used: Clickteam Fusion 2.5

Requirements:
2 MB
Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
Direct3D 9 (or newer, if you want)
and that's all. <_>
